name: Room with a Hue
description:
🎨 Room with a Hue is a short pixel trading quest game about an apartment tenant who ran out of color while creating a painting. 

🎨 Help your neighbors and collect the colors you need to get the job done.

🎨 Contains 2 different ending paintings. 

🎨 My first game! Created during the Pixelles Game Incubator VIII edition.
